sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"承认"之意。
means: acknowledge ：通常指公开承认某事的真实情况或自己的过错。
admit ：强调因外力或良心驱使或经判断而明确承认，多含不情愿或被迫意味。
confess ：语气较强，着重承认自己意识到的错误或罪行，含坦白忏悔的意味。
recognize ：作"承认"解时，系书面用词，主要指合法的或外交上的承认，也指公认。
concede ：指在事实与证据面前勉强或不得不承认。

sentence.Network_en: He will not concede what anything ails his business.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不允许任何事情来干扰他的工作.

sentence.Network_en: The organisers of the demonstration concede that they hadn't sought permission for it.
sentence.Network_cn: 游行示威的组织者承认他们并未申请批准这次活动。

sentence.Network_en: I concede that you are right.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... conceal v. 隐藏 concede ? v. 承认 concentrate ? v. 集中，浓缩.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... conceal 隐藏 concede 承认;让步 conceit 自负;意念.
comply…to… 服从，遵守concede 承认；让出；让予confirmed and irrevocable L/C (Letter of Credit) a.
记忆英语单词方法 ... demolish （推翻）， concede （认输） spend （花费），.

list.abs: administration officials concede that Moscow's economic boom is fueling a more independent Russian foreign policy and that U.S. criticism of Russian policies increasingly falls on deaf ears . Mr.美国政府官员承认，俄罗斯的经济发展正促使该国在外交政策上日益独立，他们已经开始对美国的指责充耳不闻。
...到收看观众当中拥枪者不在少数的关系，两位主持人又“勉强同意”（"concede that"）他们射击的目标不符合原来卡罗斯射穿的瞄准 …
they conceded us the right to cross their land ., 他们容许我们在他们的土地上有过路权.
“法国大选”相关词汇 ... polling station 投票站 concede defeat 承认败选 take a back seat 允许他人领先；甘愿居于人下；退居幕后.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from French concéder or Latin concedere, from con- 'completely' + cedere 'yield'

entry.def: If you concede something, you admit, often unwillingly, that it is true or correct.

example.ex: Bess finally conceded that Nancy was right...
example.tran: 贝丝最终承认了南希是对的。

example.ex: 'Well,' he conceded, 'I do sometimes mumble a bit.'...
example.tran: “嗯，”他承认道，“我有时候说话的确有点吐字不清。”

entry.def: If you concede something to someone, you allow them to have it as a right or privilege.

example.ex: The government conceded the right to establish independent trade unions...
example.tran: 政府承认建立独立工会的权利。

example.ex: Facing total defeat in Vietnam, the French subsequently conceded full independence to Laos.
example.tran: 法国人在越南面临彻底的失败后，接着又让老挝取得了完全的独立。

entry.def: If you concede something, you give it to the person who has been trying to get it from you.

example.ex: A strike by some ten thousand bank employees has ended after the government conceded some of their demands.
example.tran: 政府答应了他们的一些要求后，大约有一万名银行员工参加的罢工结束了。

entry.tran: (在体育运动中)未能阻止(对方进球或得分)
entry.def: In sport, if you concede goals or points, you are unable to prevent your opponent from scoring them.

example.ex: They conceded four goals to Leeds United...
example.tran: 他们被利兹联队攻进4个球。

example.ex: Luton conceded a free kick on the edge of the penalty area.
example.tran: 卢顿未能在罚球区的边缘截住对方的任意球。

entry.def: If you concede a game, contest, or argument, you end it by admitting that you can no longer win.

example.ex: Reiner, 56, has all but conceded the race to his rival...
example.tran: 56岁的赖纳在比赛中几乎已经向对手认输了。

example.ex: Alain Prost finished third and virtually conceded the world championship.
example.tran: 阿兰·普罗斯特以第三名的成绩结束比赛，实际上已经将世界冠军的位置拱手让人。

entry.def: If you concede defeat, you accept that you have lost a struggle.

example.ex: Airtours conceded defeat in its attempt to take control of holiday industry rival Owners Abroad...
example.tran: 空中旅游公司承认其对度假服务行业竞争对手海外业主旅行社的控股企图以失败告终。
他欣然接受了选举的失败。

means.word_mean: 1. admit, make a clean breast of;

sentences.sentence: "She confessed that she had taken the money"

means.word_mean: 3. give over; surrender or relinquish to the physical control of another

sentences.sentence: "The candidate conceded after enough votes had come in to show that he would lose"

stems_affixes.word_buile: antecede[v.先行,先于]+ent……的→adj.先行的;以前的
un无+precedent[n.先例;惯例]+ed……的→无先例的
precede[v.在先,优于]+ent→预先走的东西→先例
pro在前+ced行走,前进+ure表名词→在前面走完的程序
ac+ced行走,前进+e→和别人走在一起→答应
ante前+ced行走,前进+e→走在前面→先行

stems_affixes.value_cn: 承认;容许;[比赛结束前]认输;退让
stems_affixes.word_buile: con共同+ced行走,前进+e→共同向后走一步→让步
inter在……中间+ced行走,前进+e→在二者中间走→调解
pre预先+ced行走,前进+e→预先走→优走
re后+ced行走,前进+e→向后走→撤退
se分开+ced行走,前进+e→分开走→脱离

Sentence.sentence: Schweitzer concedes his research runs counter to a very large body of literature that commends the many benefits of goal-setting.

sentences.en: I conceded that I had made a mistake.
sentences.cn: 我承认我犯了一个错误。

jushi.english: She was so persistent that I conceded at last.
jushi.chinese: 她非常固执,所以我最后让步了。

jushi.english: The government conceded defeat as soon as the election results were known.
jushi.chinese: 选举结果一揭晓,政府就承认失败。

jushi.english: He refused to concede an inch.
